subject: Horse Racing
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Horses
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Larry Jones and Jim Squires, two of the most outspoken critics on the use of drugs in horse racing, recently had a colt of their own fail a drug test, a result that they are saying was sabotage.
snippet: Larry Jones and Jim Squires, two of the most outspoken critics on the use of drugs in horse racing, recently had a colt of their own fail a drug test, a result that they are saying was sabotage.
